text: Azenir vamɨran aven, me amizibar mɨkarziba akɨraghasezɨma men ganganiba bar dera. Iakɨnir 6plan me mean tememɨn apongezir boremɨn amizibar mɨkarziba aghefi. Egha iakɨnir 6plan igharazibar me borer mughuriar aghuim zuimɨn me aghefi. Bizir kabar gɨn me guivir igiaba vaghvagha me isa ghua Atrivim Serksisɨn akakasi.
